CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Boreal_NF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Boreal_NF_Hectares__c )+ IF( ISBLANK(Community_Forestry_NF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Community_Forestry_NF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Conservation_Purposes_NF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Conservation_Purposes_NF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Temperate_NF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Temperate_NF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Tropical_NF_Hectares__c ) , 0, Tropical_NF_Hectares__c ) + IF( ISBLANK(Plantations_NF_Hectares__c) , 0, Plantations_NF_Hectares__c)
CustomField.label: Total (Non-SLIMF) (Hectares)
